content: Evening Rohan. Welcome back to SG! Light recovery session with Rachel is locked in for 8:30am tomorrow.
Thanks Ruby, perfect timing after yesterday's flight.
Plan is 20 mins mobility + easy core activation to get you loose. No heavy lifting for now.
Sounds good Rachel üëç Will see you on Zoom tomorrow.
Great session today! You were tighter through left hip flexor but responded well to stretches.
Felt that release, thanks. Nice to be moving again.
Rachel wants to do a quick form check tomorrow evening for your heavier Phase 2 lifts - ok to lock 6pm? Schedule's clear, checked with Sarah
6pm works. Appreciate the catch on this.
Rohan, your aerobic base is now solid. To push VO‚ÇÇ max into top 5%, we'll introduce Zone 5 HIIT: short, all-out bursts.
Got it. Will this be on bike or runs?
Bike to start as they have less joint load. Protocol: 4 x 30s max effort + 90s slow recovery. Goal is absolute max in work phases.
Sounds intense. When do you want me to test it?
Wednesday AM would be ideal. Recovery day after to lock in adaptations.
Cook has confirmed full 'Nutrition v2.0' in play this week. Snacks are same as Jakarta run.
Perfect. She's really streamlined things.
Form check time - joining Zoom now.
Bar path is clean. Watch elbow flare on last reps of bench. Safe to progress weight by 2.5kg next block.
Will focus on that.
First HIIT session done. Extremely difficult. Whoop strain 18.5 üòÖ That ok?
Exactly what we're targetingüëç That's the 'dose'. Tomorrow is full recovery, adaptations happen then.
Copy that. Will keep it light.
Sleep score looks a bit low last night - want me to push morning call tomorrow to 8:30?
Yes please.
Advik, I read HIIT can spike oxidative stress. How does that fit with lowering inflammation? Is recovery the key?
Spot on - this is hormesis. Short intense stress ‚Üí body adapts, builds resilience, lowers chronic inflammation risk over time.
Makes sense. Good to see the big picture here.
Post-HIIT, keep carbs higher for 24h to speed glycogen replenishment. Cook has this covered.
Noted. Meals have been spot on lately.
Tomorrow is optional swim or walk‚ÄîAdvik says keep it zone 1. Shall I book pool slot?
Let's book. Pool > walk in this heat.
Nice work this week, Rohan. You've integrated a high-strain modality without derailing recovery, this is maturity in action.
Thanks Neel. Definitely felt like a step up.
Blood draw reminder for Monday - fasting, 8am slot at Camden. Want driver booked?
Yes please.
Pool slot confirmed for 4pm. Towels on site.
üëç
Swim looked smooth from the tracker. It kept HR in perfect zone.
Felt easy, nice change of pace.
Closing the week: HIIT ‚úÖ Strength ‚úÖ Recovery ‚úÖ. You're set for bloods Monday.
Thanks team!
